verses.name: Genesis 42:13
verses.text: And they said, Thy servants are twelve brethren, the sons of one man in the land of Canaan; and, behold, the youngest is this day with our father, and one is not.

verses.name: Genesis 42:14
verses.text: And Joseph said unto them, That is it that I spake unto you, saying, Ye are spies:

verses.name: Genesis 42:15
verses.text: Hereby ye shall be proved: By the life of Pharaoh ye shall not go forth hence, except your youngest brother come hither.
